```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)

```



```{r}
bio <- read.csv(here("data", "Biomass data", "bio.csv"))

key <- read_excel(here("data", "Biomass data", "specieskeykey.xlsx"))

mobility <- read_csv(here("data", "Dyrad_Food_Provision", "Mobility and Growth Rates.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()


```





```{r}

antlantic_sub <- mobility %>% 
  select(common_name, growth_rate_r, mobility_m, mobility_classification) %>% 
  filter(str_detect(common_name, "Atlantic"))






```

```{r}
growth_r <- ggplot(data = antlantic_sub, aes(x = reorder(common_name, -growth_rate_r), y = growth_rate_r)) +
  geom_col(fill = "purple") +
  coord_flip()
  


```
